/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and motorcycles, the primary mode of transportation, are scattered throughout the scene, adding a dynamic element to the image. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, which shines brightly in the top right corner, casting long shadows and highlighting the city's hustle and bustle.
